VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Sustainable Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Sustainable Fashion is arc {Vintage}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Athleisure?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Athleisure is arc {Vintage}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {High Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Sustainable Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Vintage to Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Athleisure to Vintage in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from High Fashion to Athleisure in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Streetwear in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Streetwear is {246}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and High Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and High Fashion is {354}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Athleisure?
SC.A: The total flow output from Athleisure is {677}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by High Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow input by High Fashion is {379}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 399? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {418} from {Streetwear} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {434} from {High Fashion} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 95? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {25} from {Athleisure} to {High Fashion}, a flow of {58} from {Vintage} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 232 and 326? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {246} from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion}, a flow of {317} from {Athleisure} to {Vintage}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Sustainable Fashion to Streetwear or from High Fashion to Athleisure?
NC.A: The flow from {High Fashion} to {Athleisure} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Athleisure to High Fashion, from Streetwear to Sustainable Fashion, or from High Fashion to Athleisure?
NC.A: The flow from {High Fashion} to {Athleisure} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {High Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {High Fashion} and {Sustainable Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Athleisure, Arc Streetwear, Arc Vintage, Arc Sustainable Fashion, Arc High Fashion}.
